text:
Steven James Brody (May 22, 1970 – February 22, 2019), known professionally as Brody Stevens, was an American stand-up comedian and actor. He was known for his roles in the television series ', and was known for appearances on "Chelsea Lately". He starred in "The Hangover" (2009) and "Due Date" (2010).
On February 22, 2019, Stevens was found dead in his Los Angeles after hanging himself, aged 48.
